ComicInfo.Penciller: Earl Geier,Stefano Gaudiano,Steve Pugh,Rick Geary,Stefano Gaudiano,Steve Pugh,Earl Geier,Rick Geary
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue launches three new stories: Harlequin, a mysterious tale in which the title character searches for the missing body of his dead lover, is written by Stephen Csutoras and illustrated by Stefano (Kafka) Gaudiano; Downtown, from England's hit comics/music zine Deadline, written by Ian Edgington and illustrated by Steve (Grimjack) Pugh, is a belated Christmas adventure with the world's only zombie detective; and more creepy cases for Detective Will Ford and his partner in Homicide, written by John (Terminator) Arcudi and illustrated by Tim (The Spectre) Gula! Plus, a special appearance from Rick Geary- "Desperate Clergy!"
ComicInfo.Title: Harlequin Act I; A Nightmare on Elf Street!; Tick; Desperate Clergy
ComicInfo.Writer: Ian Edginton,John Arcudi,Rick Geary,Stephen Csutoras,Stephen Csutoras,Ian Edginton,John Arcudi,Rick Geary
